name: AVCaptureDeviceInput
desc: A capture input that provides media from a capture device to a capture session.

items.name: init(device: AVCaptureDevice)
items.desc: Initializes an input to use a specified device.

items.name: func ports(for: AVMediaType?, sourceDeviceType: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType?, sourceDevicePosition: AVCaptureDevice.Position) -> [AVCaptureInput.Port]
items.desc: Retrieves a virtual device’s constituent device ports for use in a multi-camera session.

items.name: var unifiedAutoExposureDefaultsEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the input enables unified auto-exposure defaults.

items.name: var videoMinFrameDurationOverride: CMTime
items.desc: A time value that acts as a modifier to a capture device’s activeVideoMinFrameDuration property.
